review: I was pleasantly surprised by this product. The remote is very intuitive and voice search is good but limited to Amazon based apps and products. Video streams super fast and I was able to use my Xbox 360 controllers to play games the device using a usb wireless connector. Overall a good product. Not as open as a chromecast but it has the chromecast beat on speed and storage.
author: Khalid Holmes

review: The best "break away from cable" product for me. Easy to install and use. The viewing choices seem endless!  I'm saving hundreds of $$$$ !
author: Cyd "java diva"

review: works very good, it is grumpy sometimes because I have a slow connection 1.7 but I get very few stops. I don't like not having an off function like apple. nor does it have control of resolution for low band width situations. the screen saver seems to take a lot of bandwidth to run, so I have to unplug it. it keeps saying loading????
author: Rodger Beaton

review: This product would not work in the location where I installed it.  The reason was because my wifi signal was not strong enough.  After buffering for 30 seconds to a minute I received a notice on the screen that the signal was too weak.  I bought a wifi signal booster and it was not successful for this location.  I returned both the Amazon Fire TV and the wifi signal booster to Amazon.
author: Virginia Webb

review: Really enjoy the fire tv.  I have other devices (Echo, Chromecast and Fire Stick).  The amazon devices are great because of the controllers and user interface.  The tv is good if you want a little extra speed/memory and most importantly a hard wired connection.  It also offers digital audio output so we are able to use it on a cheaper tv and still get the sound in high quality to our surround system.Biggest downside is the voice input. After having the Echo for a couple months, the voice commands and searching feels very limited on the fire tv.
author: Cory

review: Excellent product, well constructed, very good attention to detail even on the packing. Amazon content selection can be improved.
author: Luis Marichal

review: I thought there would be more streaming news channels. I'm thinking of just getting an Apple TV so that I can stream directly from my iPhone.
